tool_description: Tax Parcel Property Boundary lines across the US based on input coordinates. New updated servers for faster responses!
name: Property Lines
title: Property Lines

api_list.name: Get All US State Boundaries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://property-lines.p.rapidapi.com/get_all_us_state_boundaries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "property-lines.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://property-lines.p.rapidapi.com/get_all_us_state_boundaries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "property-lines.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Radius Boundary
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the property boundaries associated with a given latitude and longitude coordinate within a given radius, if any exist.

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius of property boundaries to return.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Provide state abbreviation and county to reduce response time.

optional_parameters.name: county
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Provide state abbreviation and county to reduce response time.

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Provide either coords or lat & lon.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Provide either coords or lat & lon.

api_list.name: Get County Boundary
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the  county property boundaries associated with a given latitude and longitude coordinate, if any exist.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Provide either coords or lat & lon.

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Provide either coords or lat & lon.

api_list.name: Get All Counties In State Boundaries
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all county boundaries in the state associated with a given latitude and longitude coordinate, if any exist.

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Either coords or lat & lon are required.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Either coords or lat & lon are required.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Provide a state abbreviation to reduce response time.

api_list.name: Get Single Boundary
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the property boundaries associated with a given latitude and longitude coordinate, if any exist.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Provide state abbreviation and county to reduce response time.

optional_parameters.name: county
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Provide state and county to reduce response time.

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Either coords or lat & lon are required.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Either coords or lat & lon are required.

api_list.name: Get State Boundary
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the  state property boundaries associated with a given latitude and longitude coordinate, if any exist.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Provide either coords or lat & lon.
